posts.cooked:
I’m going to do my best to not make this sound like a rant at all but here goes.

My team is trying to buy the power distribution hub from Rev, link and when we first looked it was “expected to be available in October”, alright then cool. After that we waited until then when it changed to “expected to be available in November”, okay whatever it’s not super urgent we just want it for next season. Then the same thing happened but now it’s going to be in December, this is getting annoying but whatever. December rolls around now it says “Mid-December”, extremely annoying but now it’s a bit more specific so hopefully it’s around this time. Then we wait all December and… nothing, and now it just says “Out of stock” with no expected availability.

I don’t know if we just missed the restock or something but this is getting absurd, we just wanted 1 for this season but we can’t even get that. At least the neos and sparkmaxes actually came back in stock. Is anyone else having this issue?
Another note: It doesn’t help that the Hub is objectively better than the PDP from before.

posts.name: Brian Wagg
posts.cooked: You’ve missed restocks (2 in the past couple months I believe). There is more expected next week I believe. Put your email in on the product page to be notified when they come back in stock.

posts.name: REV Robotics Co-founder & CEO
posts.cooked:
They have come back into stock multiple times so far, but have sold out in a few days each time.  The best thing to do is enter your email on our product page and you will be notified when they go back into stock.  When it comes to electronic products, we have been getting them in batches as components become available to us.

But you are also in luck, because they will be going back into stock within the next hour.
oh well that’s good to know thanks

posts.name: Garrett Calkins
posts.cooked:
REV Robotics - 2022/23 Product Releases & Updates General Forum

Greg and the Rev team have been really good about posting updates in this thread, I’d suggest keeping an eye on it for when to expect restocks

posts.name: Nelson Green (1108 Mentor Coach Electrical Programming)
